TopicTitle: My Kerbin Orbital Outpost and standard launcher!

Articles.Content:
I just thought it'd be cool to share my ideas for a small 1.25m station, and as I still don't understand how to embed albums and I'm lazy, here's the link:

[http://imgur.com/a/c4nJD](http://imgur.com/a/c4nJD)

I'm experimenting with unusual rocket design, so I decided to pull a Falcon 9 and put 8 LV-T30s(Non gimbal 215kN, right?) and a Skipper in the middle. Let me know of any other interesting and unusual rocket designs like this, I had fun building this first stage, as simple as it is. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Thanks for checking this out, let me know how to embed albums and if you have any cool unique ideas for rockets!

-Slab

To embed the above album: 

[ Imgur]c4nJD[/imgur]

Type it just like that only remove the spaces and you get this:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/c4nJD)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-25T02:44:33Z" title="02/25/2015 02:44  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 25, 2015</time> by ExplorerKlatt**
Cool, thanks. Any ideas for interesting first stages? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
